channel.title: More Child Boards?
channel.description:
Well the heading says it all , it would really help organize the forums kind of like Science , Math , Geography and stuff for homework section ..
On the graphics section have a child board for SOTW's , one for Animation tutorials inside the tutorials child boards , etc.
IDK I think its a good idea you guys decide :o

item.title: More Child Boards?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I really dislike the idea of child boards, really the only place it makes sense in my opinion is the SRL scripts section.

Plus like bobdole says, the homework board is one of the least used boards.

Read full topic

item.title: More Child Boards?
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

I don’t think homework help gets enough posts to justify child boards…also I would think animation tutorials would come just fine under general graphics tutorials, which only has two pages worth of posts.

Read full topic

item.title: More Child Boards?
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

True…But it would reall help the homework section which gets spammed alot…

Read full topic

item.title: More Child Boards?
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

It does get ugly at times though.
